question: After which among the following events, the Cabinet Mission plan was thought to have become defunct?
option1: Call for a Direct Action Day by Muslim League
option2: Boycott of the Muslim Legue of the Constituent assembly
option3: The formation of the Interim Government
explanation: After the declaration of Clement Attlee, the Cabinet Mission plan was thought to have become defunct. Atlee served the post of British Prime Minister from 1945 to 1951. On February 20, 1947 Atlee declared the British would quit India before June 1948.
